problem_text:
Let p be a prime number and let G be the group of all matrices of the form
( 1 + pα   pβ
  pγ      1 + pδ ),
where α, β, γ, δ are rational numbers with denominators coprime to p. Does G have the property RN?
Yu. I. Merzlyakov
answer: Yes, it does (G. A. Noskov, Siberian Math. J., 14 (1973), 475–477).
